SQL.statement: CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE Lime PAGESIZE 4 K MANAGED BY DATABASE USING ( FILE 'DB2\Lime' 5120 ) EXTENTSIZE 16 OVERHEAD 12.5 PREFETCHSIZE 16 TRANSFERRATE 0.13 BUFFERPOOL "IBMDEFAULTBP" DROPPED TABLE RECOVERY ON
COMMENT ON TABLESPACE Lime IS 'Tablespace for general use.'
CREATE LARGE TABLESPACE Apple MANAGED BY DATABASE USING (FILE 'Apple0' 5000, FILE 'Apple1' 5000)
CREATE TABLESPACE Grape MANAGED BY DATABASE USING (FILE 'Grape0' 5000, FILE 'Grape1' 5000)
